languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс молча переваривает сказанное вами. Затем хмыкает и изрекает:{/n} "Тогда наша встреча весьма своевременна. Я реквизирую вас и вашу свиту для выполнения моей задачи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс молча переваривает сказанное вами. Затем хмыкает и изрекает:{/n} "Тогда наша встреча весьма своевременна. Я реквизирую вас и вашу свиту для выполнения моей задачи".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс молча переваривает сказанное вами. Затем хмыкает и изрекает:{/n} "Тогда наша встреча весьма своевременна. Я реквизирую вас и вашу свиту для выполнения моей задачи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."
{n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you told him. Then he humphs and says, rather solemnly,{/n} "That is impossible at the present time."

{n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

{n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

{n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

{n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

languages.text: {n}海因里希默默地思考着你的话，之后满意地“嗯”了一声，开了口。{/n}“既然如此，那我们见面的时机实在是太巧了。我正在在执行任务，需要你和你的随行人员提供协助。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希默默地思考着你的话，之后不满地“嗯”了一声，开了口。{/n}“就目前看来，这个目标无法实现。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix denkt schweigend über deine Worte nach. Dann brummt er zufrieden und sagt:{/n} "Dann ist der Zeitpunkt unseres Treffens zufälliger Natur. Ich werde Euch und Euer Gefolge für meine Aufgabe requirieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix denkt schweigend über deine Worte nach. Dann brummt er unzufrieden und sagt:{/n} "Das ist zum gegenwärtigen Zeitpunkt unmöglich."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix réfléchit quelques instants à ce que vous venez de lui annoncer. Il exprime un « hmm » de satisfaction et répond :{/n} « Dans ce cas, notre rencontre ne pouvait pas mieux tomber. Je vous réquisitionne, vous et l'ensemble de votre équipage, pour mener à bien ma mission. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix réfléchit quelques instants à ce que vous venez de lui annoncer. Il exprime un « hmm » de mécontentement et répond :{/n} « Cela ne va pas être possible pour le moment. »

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはこちらの話した内容を静かに飲み込むと、「ふむ」と満足げに漏らして言った。{/n}「ならば、こうして会えたのは僥倖です。我が任務のために、あなたとあなたの家臣を徴用いたします」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、こちらの話した内容を静かに飲み込み、「ふむ」と満足げに漏らして言った。{/n}「ならば、こうして会えたのは偶然だ。俺の任務であなたと家臣を徴用する」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix medita en silencio lo que acabas de contarle. Finalmente, emite un "mmm" satisfecho y responde:{/n} «En ese caso, nuestro encuentro es fortuito. Su séquito y usted quedan bajo mi mando para esta tarea».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix medita en silencio lo que acabas de contarle. Finalmente, emite un "mmm" insatisfecho y responde:{/n} «Eso es imposible en este momento».

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, kendisine söylediklerini sessizce düşünüyor. Sonra tatmin olmuşçasına "hımm" sesi çıkarıp şöyle diyor:{/n} "O zaman karşılaşmamız tesadüfi gelişti. Size ve maiyetinize görevim gereği el koyuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix ruminates silently on what you have told him. Then he makes a "hmm" of satisfaction and says,{/n} "Then the timing of our meeting is fortuitous. I am requisitioning you and your retinue for my task."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, kendisine söylediklerini sessizce düşünüyor. Sonra tatmin olmuşcasına "hımm" sesi çıkarıyor ve şöyle diyor:{/n} "O zaman karşılaşmamız tesadüfi gelişti. Size ve maiyetinize görevim gereği el koyuyorum."
